name: Sick Way (Frank Pickles)
description:
Created for Mini Jam 109:Depth(s) in the game you must use your health to move or perform actions such as opening doors. You will have to choose one of five cards to get a certain number of moves and a consequence for your health.

-Use the mouse to select the cards-


Or you can wait for a moment to recover strength and health, but every time you wait your cards are replaced by more dangerous cards.

Make decisions and survive while trying to escape from the place.




PD: My language is not English, I apologize in advance for any failure in the translation of the game.
